altTitles.en: My Elder Sister Is the Great Celebrity
My Elder Sister Is the Superstar

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ De Jiějiě Shì Dà Míngxīng

description.en:
What? My elder sister, who is lazy, charming, and abusive, is not born of the same parents as me? What? She wants to be a Superstar, but fortunately, I have a system and a cheat. Help remove all obstacles in her way! What? My parents asked me to help solve her single status problem, but I’m still single! Why don’t you guys care for me? ! The system said: I think the two of you are quite suitable, and I will match you guys up. I won’t do it, As a brother, I will protest against it!

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30704)
- [Alternative Raw (IQIYI)](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1hjftkhw59x.html)
description.id: Apa? Kakak perempuan yang sangat pemalas, cantik, dan kasar, tidak lahir dari orang tua yang sama denganku?  Apa? Dia ingin menjadi bintang besar, tapi untungnya, aku telah mendapat sistem dan jari emas yang benar. Anda harus membantu dia menghilangkan semua rintangan! Apa? Orang tuaku memintaku untuk membantunya memecahkan masalah lajangnya, padahal aku sendiri masih lajang!  Kenapa kau tidak memperdulikanku?! Sistem berkata: Aku pikir Anda berdua cukup cocok, jadi kenapa tidak.... Aku tidak akan melakukannya, aku protes, akan buruk jika sesama saudara saling....
description.zh: 什么？我那好吃懒做、红颜妖孽、虐我为乐的亲姐居然和我不是一个爸妈生的？ 什么？她想当大明星，幸好我系统加身，妥妥的人形金手指。帮她扫平一切障碍 ！ 什么？爸妈让我帮忙解决她的大龄单身问题，我都还单着呢！你们怎么不想想我 ？！ 系统说：我觉得你两就挺合适，我来撮合撮合。 我不干，我抗议，当弟弟就
